Went here based on all of the positive reviews on yelp.  So glad we did.  Once you get past the location which is down a pretty quiet alley, everything was five star.   Service was very friendly.  Everything is homemade every day.  We had empanadas, pasta, and raviolis.  Every single dish was impeccably done.  The pasta was as good as any five star restaurant in Italy that I have ever been to.  The craziest thing is that dinner, drink and dessert for five was under 50 euro.  Unreal bargain for the best meal we had in our 10 days in Spain.
